item.title: Report X-2024100442
item.description:
Report X-2024100442

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-05T09:31:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-01
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING MEDICAL SWABS FOR SCREENING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED.

item.title: Report X-2024100443
item.description:
Report X-2024100443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-05T09:31:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-01
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DUE TO FROST FORMING ON THE OUTER BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING CHEESECAKES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING USED TO COOL THE CHEESECAKES. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024100094
item.description:
Report X-2024100094

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-03T09:21:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) RECEIVED A CALL TO RETRIEVE A LEAKING PACKAGE FROM THE SMALLS SORT. DR RETRIEVED PACKAGE AND RETURNED TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER (PSC). DR OPENED THE WET PACKAGE AND SAW THE PRODUCT WAS 99% ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL. DR WILL DISPOSE OF CONTETS VIA SOLIDIFICATION PER THE DAMAGED MATERIALS PROGRAM PROTOCOL.

item.title: Report X-2024100138
item.description:
Report X-2024100138

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-03T09:21:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) RECEIVED A CALL TO RETRIEVE A LEAKING PACKAGE. DR BROUGHT THE LEAKING PACKAGE BACK TO THE CENTRAL PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER(PSC)CAGE. DR TRIAGED PACKAGE AND FOUND SEVERAL BOTTLES TO BE LEAKING. DR PLACED A SERVICE CROSS ON THE PACKAGE. A SECOND DR TRIAGED THE LEAKING CONTENTS USING THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART AND DOWNLOADED THE SAFETY DATA SHEET (SDS). THE SDS SHOWED THIS PRODUCT WAS A CLASS 8 BUT COULD PASS AS LIMITED QUANTITY. AFTER SECOND DR CONFIRMED THE OUTER PACKAGING DID NOT HAVE ANY LIMITED QUANTITY DIAMOND OR ANY HAZARDOUS MARKINGS, THE HAZARDOUS MATERIALS SERVICE CENTER (HMSC) WAS CONTACTED. NATHANIEL AT THE HMSC TOOK THE INFORMATION AND DETERMINED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS CONSIDERED UNDECLARED.
